data.actual_result: The friend you removed stays on the list until you reupdate the list.
data.expected_result: After removing the user as a friend from that tab, they should be removed from the list.
data.short_description: Removing a friend from "Mutual Friend" tab does not remove them from that list
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a user with mutual friends and go to their profile - Go to the mutual friends tab and right click a user and remove them - Observe
